pullRequest.title: fix: respect PDML timeout when using streaming RPC
pullRequest.bodyText:
@thiagotnunes Would you mind trying the same test with this PR? I don't have a dataset that is big enough that it will run for more than one hour.
Fixes #336

commit.message: fix: respect PDML timeout when using streaming RPC
fix: check for negative or zero deadline

nodes.bodyText: nit: would it be hard to inject the Stopwatch instead? Not a big deal, just wondering if we could use composition here. Disregard if it would be too hard to inject.

commit.message: fix: subtract from original timeout to get remaining
